questions: If a represents any number, what is the expression for "five more than twice the number"?
What is the algebraic expression for "the product of a number and the sum of 6 and 3"?
If b is the number of chocolates, you have and each chocolate costs Rs. 15, what is the expression for "the total cost of b chocolates"?
Write the algebraic expression for "the difference between twice p and q."
If c represents the total number of books on a shelf and each shelf has 4 books, what is the expression for "the number of shelves"?
If m = 8, find the value of 3m − 5.
If n is an even number, what is the expression for "five more than thrice n"?
